lw3dge.components

Interface Updatable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Camera, FirstPersonControlledCamera, GameEntity, GraphicalEntity, Scene, Transform

    public interface Updatable
    This interface give a base for all classes that require mathematical updates to function in the game engine. Tick methods are called in order of scope. (Zoomed out to Zoomed in)
    Author:
    Jared Massa

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void tick()
      A method all classes must define for themselves when they implement this interface.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        void tick()
        A method all classes must define for themselves when they implement this interface. This method should be filled with the calculations that must be done every frame update of the game engine. (If you didn't figure it out, Tick() is short hand for Update())
